scripts.nunit-test: cd nunit.test && dotnet restore && dotnet add package NunitXml.TestLogger --version 4.0.254 && dotnet test --logger "nunit;LogFilePath=../reports/nunit-report.xml" || true
scripts.xunit-test: cd xunit.test && dotnet restore && dotnet add package XunitXml.TestLogger --version 3.1.20 && dotnet test --logger "xunit;LogFilePath=../reports/xunit-report.xml" || true
scripts.testng-test: cd testng.test && mvn clean install && mvn compile && mvn test || true
